original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.51. Upādinnaduka, Kusalattika🔽Anupādinnaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya  upādinna duka kusala ttika  anupādinnam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: In the Direction of Nibbāna, the Reverse Order, the Triad with the Pairs

original: Anupādinnaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Abyākatamūlaṁ ekaṁyeva paccayavasena.)🔽Mahantaradukaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: anupādinnam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na upādinnaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka abyākata mūlam ekayā iva paccaya vasena 🔽mahantara dukam niṭṭhita
